stanza.line: Sweet love renew thy force be it not saidsaid
Thy edge should blunter be than appetiteappetite
Which but to-day by feeding is allayedallayed
To-morrow sharpened in his former mightmight
So love be thou although to-day thou fillfill
Thy hungry eyes even till they wink with fulnessfulness
To-morrow see again and do not killkill
The spirit of love with a perpetual dulnessdulness
Let this sad interim like the ocean bebe
Which parts the shore where two contracted newnew
Come daily to the banks that when they seesee
Return of love more blest may be the viewview
Or call it winter which being full of carecare
Makes summer welcome thrice more wished more rarerare
